de: The official website for the Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches television anime series revealed on Sunday that the anime's first Blu-ray Disc and DVD box sets will include a Yankee-kun to Megane-chan collaborative manga and anime.
nm: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
jp: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
